Type.Name: AccelFlags

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AccelFlags extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: This enumeration is used by to decide to display or not display an accelerator key and to know if an accelerator key is removable.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.AccelFlags Locked = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Determines if the accelerator key is removable by

remarks.para: Determines if the accelerator key is removable by

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.AccelFlags Mask = int32(7)

Docs.summary: Returns full information for , displaying any modifiers, the accelerator key and the name of the associated signal to the right of any existing text.

remarks.para: Returns full information for a (the individual element in a GtkAccelGroup array), displaying any modifiers, the accelerator key and the name of the associated signal to the right of any existing text.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.AccelFlags Visible = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Determines if will display the accelerator key or not.

remarks.para: Determines if will display the accelerator key or not.
